info.description:
Provides CodeWrapper, a modified TextWrapper which is little bit smarter about code and comments 
wrapping.

You can browse the source in http://nirs.freeshell.org/code/codewrap/.

You can get the source wirh rsync or with Bazaar-NG_::

    bzr get http://nirs.freeshell.org/code/codewrap/

.. _Bazaar-NG: http://bazaar-ng.org/
info.name: codewrap
info.html_description:
Provides CodeWrapper, a modified TextWrapper which is little bit smarter about code and comments wrapping.

You can browse the source in http://nirs.freeshell.org/code/codewrap/.

You can get the source wirh rsync or with Bazaar-NG:
